subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tom Brady, who was named the league’s Most Valuable Player after a record-setting season, has not forgotten that he began his career as the N.F.L.’s version of the 98-pound weakling.
snippet: Tom Brady, who was named the league’s Most Valuable Player after a record-setting season, has not forgotten that he began his career as the N.F.L.’s version of the 98-pound weakling.
